concept.domains: (topic concept) (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)
concept.title: Interpretation for a preliminary hermeneutics

conbody.p:
This section is one of the most important for the hermeneutics of action, from the taxonomies primary data, objective, and subjective variables. Value in capital letters: implies to select the right choice of the subcategory, ie SPHERE ➞ 'outside'.
Text mining within the elements TEI ➞ body ➞ div ➞ interpGrp
TEI-XML elements:interp|desc|ref|castList|castItem|persName|stage|note|view|placeName|location|span
TEI-XML attributes: n|target|xml:id|ana|type|cert
Attributes values:
traditionally proposed in TEI-XML: REF POINTER
from objective variables: TAXO|subTAXO|RESULT|ROLE|SPHERE|CONTEXT|GENETIC SEX
from subjective variables: VOLUNTARY INTENT|MOTIVATION|DEGREE DESIRE|EMOTION|hasEmotionIntensity|CONSEQUENCE
related to primary data within text: CHARACTER (animated entitiy)

p.codeblock: Action belongs to verb competition, subcategory contend: mḫṣ defeat of the oppositionAccording to results following this current action ʿAnatu role: active battlevalley outside her household Voluntary intentionality, to destroy of her free will, with rage (level five) Consequence: an impact on ʿAnatu and others

conbody.p: Explanations of relevant elements and attributes for the interpretation, according to (1) structural unit, and (2) analytical taxonomies:

Preliminary step, one shall define the linked subsection within within transcription to the words' group that are investigated: in interp , ref pointer ana which refers to xml:id of l — in example below ktu1.3_ii_l5b_6a. ￫ Xpath: interp[ana=‘xml:id #value’]

Before each interpretation according to analytical taxonomies, and which follows an element, ref, target that points to a structural unit value. ￫ Summary: interp[ana=‘xml:id #value’]/desc/one or two element(s)/ref[n =‘value number’ and target=‘structural unit #value’]
What action (#whatAction) in ref, target to point to structural unit n ‘1’ ➞
ACTION (belongs to primaryData ) within transcription , xml:id refers to w, pos ‘verb’ that is analyzed — in example below #ktu1-3_ii_l5b-6a_tmtḫṣ for ‘tmtḫṣ’
‘TAXO’ and ‘subTAXO’ (belongs to objective variables) refers to ana from previous ACTION's verb — in example below #verb.competition #contend
￫ Summary: ref[n=‘1’ and target=‘#whatAction #ktu1-3_ii_l5b-6a_tmtḫṣ’ and ana=‘#verb.competition #contend’]
What result (#whatResult which belongs to #objectiveVar) in ref to point to structural unit n ‘2’ ➞
stage, ana ‘RESULT #value’ where can be added a comment for refering to the result of the action that follow the line within note, ana=‘xml:id #line's value’ — in example below #defeatOpposition and refering to the result provided in lines ktu1-3_ii_l7_int and ktu1-3_ii_l8_int.
￫ Summary: ref[n=‘2’ and target=‘#whatResult’]/stage[ana=‘#defeate_ofOpposition’]
What animated entity (#whatCharacter which belongs to primaryData within text and objective variables) in ref to point to structural unit n ‘3’ ➞
ref is within castList ➞ castItem[n=‘1’] ➞ persName with type=‘Character’ and ana ‘AE value’ and ‘genetic sex #value — in example below #ANT #Female
￫ Summary: castList/castItem/ref[n=‘3’ and target=‘#whatCharacter’]/persName[ana=‘#ANT and #Female’]
What role (#whatRole which belongs to objective variables) in ref to point to structural unit n ‘4’ ➞
ref is within castList, castItem[n=‘1’] ➞ state, ana ‘ROLE value’ — in example below #active
￫ Summary: castList/castItem/ref[n=‘4’ and target=‘#whatRole’]/stage[ana=‘#active’]
What context (#whatContext which belongs to objective variables) in ref to point to structural unit n ‘5’ ➞
ref is within view ➞ placeName, ana ‘CONTEXT value’ — in example below #battle
￫ Summary: view/ref[n=‘5’ and target=‘#whatContext’]/placeName[ana=‘#battle’]
What sphere (#whatSphere which belongs to objective variables) in ref to point to structural unit n ‘6’ ➞
ref is within location, ana ‘SPHERE value’ — in example below #outside
￫ Summary: view/ref[n=‘6’ and target=‘#whatSphere’]/location[ana=‘#outside’]
What behavior (#whatBehavior which belongs to subjective variables) AE is performing the action according to relevant behavior in ref to point to structural unit n ‘7’ ➞
ref is within stage ➞
span ana VOLUNTARY INTENTIONALITY, MOTIVATION, DEGREE DESIRE, EMOTION, hasEmotionIntensity — in example below #toDestroy #free #five_dD #rage #veryHight
span ana CONSEQUENCE — in example below #affectEntity_and_other
￫ Summary(1): stage/ref[n=‘7’ and target=‘#whatBehavior’]/span[ana=‘#toDestroy #free #five_dD #rage #veryHight’]
￫ Summary(2): stage/ref[n=‘7’ and target=‘#whatBehavior’]/span[ana=‘#affectEntity_and_other’]
Meaning: the animated entity ʿAnatu is performing an action from competition's verb grouping subcategory contend with a voluntary intentationality of destroying, from a free will, with hight level (level 5) of rage's emotion, and a hight degree of desire. She performs oustide her household, and she will be affected by her action as well as other entities.
